languages.text: Наказания одной блюстительницы недостаточно, чтобы загладить перед вами вину. Вы велите вздернуть всех блюстителей нижних палуб.

traits.locale_text: Наказания одной стражницы недостаточно, чтобы загладить перед вами вину. Вы велите вздернуть всю стражу нижних палуб.

languages.text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.
languages.original_text: Наказания одной блюстительницы недостаточно, чтобы загладить перед вами вину. Вы велите вздернуть всех блюстителей нижних палуб.

traits.locale_text: Punishing a single guard isn't going to be sufficient amends to you. You order all lower-deck security to be strung up.
Punishing a single guard isn't going to be sufficient amends to you. You order all lower-deck security to be strung up.
Punishing a single guard won't be sufficient recompense. You order all lower deck security to be strung up.
Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. {mf|He|She} orders every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.
Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. {mf|He|She} orders every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.
Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

languages.text: 仅仅是惩罚一名执法者，并不足以惩罚这种针对行商浪人本人的暴行。你命令把下层甲板所有的执法者通通吊死。
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

traits.locale_text: 仅仅是惩罚一名执法者，并不足以惩罚这种针对行商浪人本人的暴行。你命令把下层甲板所有的执法者通通吊死。

languages.text: Castigar a una sola guardia no es suficiente para compensar esta transgresión contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Ordenas ahorcar a todos los guardias de las cubiertas inferiores.
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

traits.locale_text: Castigar a una sola guardia no es suficiente para compensar esta transgresión contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Ordena ahorcar a todos los guardias de las cubiertas inferiores.

languages.text: 一人の執行官を罰するだけでは、ローグトレーダーの人間に対するこの暴挙を正すことはできない。あなたは、下甲板の執行者全員を絞首刑にするよう命じる。
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

traits.locale_text: 一人の執行官を罰するだけでは、ローグトレーダーの人間に対するこの暴挙を正すことはできない。下甲板の執行者全員を絞首刑にするよう命じる。

languages.text: Eine einzige Enforcerin zu bestrafen, wird nicht ausreichen, um diese Wut gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abzubauen. Du ordnest an, alle Enforcer auf den unteren Decks zu hängen.
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

traits.locale_text: Eine einzige Enforcerin zu bestrafen, wird nicht ausreichen, um diese Wut gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abzubauen. Du ordnest an, alle Enforcer auf den unteren Decks zu hängen.

Eine einzige Enforcerin zu bestrafen, wird nicht ausreichen, um diese Wut gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} abzubauen. {mf|Er|Sie} befiehlt, dass sämtliche Enforcers auf den Unterdecks aufgeknüpft werden.

languages.text: Punir une seule exécutante ne suffira pas à excuser l'affront commis contre la personne {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Vous ordonnez que tous les exécutants des ponts inférieurs soient pendus.
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.

traits.locale_text: Punir une seule exécutante ne suffira pas à excuser l'affront commis contre la personne {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Vous ordonnez que tous les exécutants des ponts inférieurs soient pendus.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in şahsına yapılan bu hakareti düzeltmek için bir infazcıyı cezalandırmak yetmez. Alt güvertelerdeki tüm infazcıların asılmasını emrediyorsun.
languages.original_text: Punishing a single enforcer will not be enough to redress this outrage against the Rogue Trader's person. You order every enforcer on the lower decks to be strung up.
